title:

original visual experience; high-response haptic touch

Plus, they are ultra-thin, maintaining the original visual quality of your device. Don't worry about fingerprints either, as these protectors are compatible with your device's fingerprint technology. You'll still enjoy a high-response haptic touch experience.

The camera lens protectors are also made with 9H Hardness Tempered Glass, providing scratch resistance and shatterproof protection.
